name: Terminal Future EP
description:
The TERMINAL FUTURE EP is a collection of three games set in the far-future, crafted independently in present-day Vancouver by me, Jack "Roshirai" Shirai.

Track Listing
  1. GATEWAY SHUFFLE - A down on his luck captain's last night aboard his soon-to-be-repossessed starship.
  2. LOVE INTEREST - Crew management, dating, and definitely no references to Mass Effect.
  3. TRADE OUTPOST NOVEMBER - An intergalactic swap meet to escape an automated space station.

Picking up the TERMINAL FUTURE EP bundle supports indie game development and experiments with new and interesting ways to support oneself as a game developer. More importantly, it supports the creation of things that YOU, personally, find interesting.

Grab it, and  tell me what you like about it and what you'd want to see in a future EP over on Twitter.
